list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a slope or inclined plane for joining two different levels, as at the entrance or between floors of a building.
an upward bend in a stair rail.
an electrical waveform in which the voltage increases or decreases linearly with time.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we have purposefully ramped the entrance to make it easier access
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi đã cố tình lan can vào lối vào để làm cho nó dễ dàng hơn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of an animal) rear up on its hind legs in a threatening posture.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they roared and ramped in cages
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: họ gầm lên và tràn ngập trong lồng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of an electrical waveform) increase or decrease voltage linearly with time.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the integrated circuit's output then ramps in the negative direction
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đầu ra của mạch tích hợp sau đó dốc theo hướng âm
